text: The Communist Party of Britain (CPB) is a communist party in Great Britain. It was made because of a dispute between Eurocommunists and Marxist-Leninists in the Communist Party of Great Britain in 1988. It is friends with the Cuba Solidarity Campaign and the Venezuela Solidarity Campaign. The party was one of two British political parties that signed the Pyongyang Declaration. ==Notes== ==References== Category:Political parties in the United Kingdom Category:Communist parties in Europe
title: Communist Party of Britain
